content: Develop a paragraph with every word starting with the letter 't'.

Here is a paragraph where every word starts with the letter 't':

"The talented treasurer tirelessly tracked tiny transactions, totting up totals. Tackling tricky tabs, she trumpeted triumph. Though tedious, her tenacity turned the tide, turning trepidation into trust. Thus, the team toasted her terrific talent, thanking her tirelessly."
